aboutMe.name: John Doe
aboutMe.title: Full-Stack Developer
bio: A programmer with a passion for coding and problem-solving. Hi, my name is Akshay, my focus is on creating accessible tech products that impacts people beyond social and economic barrier.

I am a self-taught developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript, ReactJs, and NextJs. I am proficient in working with modern AI tools and technologies to build scalable and efficient web applications that provides real-world solutions.
I specialise in creating AI-driven voice & chat interface, and software as a service (SaaS) applications.

now.cta: I work as a freelance developer for startups to create customised AI & SaaS products. I also do consulting for businesses & brands to create new or improve existing websites, web apps with AI.

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Developed responsive web applications using React and Next.js.
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI.
Optimized performance, reducing load times by 20%.

workExperience.title: Junior Web Developer
responsibilities: Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
Integrated third-party services like Stripe for payments.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio built with Next.js and deployed on Vercel, showcasing my skills and projects.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A full-stack task management tool with user authentication and real-time updates.
